title: How to strongly dedicate yourself to work - Quora

response.answer_text: Some people have a strong work ethic or a strong desire to succeed or do well. However, it has been my experience that the best performers and happiest employees are the ones who love what they are doing. Have you ever heard someone say, “I can’t believe they pay me to do this job. I love it so much, I would pay them.” I have heard people say that, and I want to be like them!

I strongly dedicate myself to my work by loving what I do. I know this is not an easy task, but somehow I learn to love all that I have to do and try my maximum to do things with dedication and passion. I try not to do other activities or things during my working time. I try to give my hundred percent dedication towards it as well.
